title: Train 'Tracks' Bundle
description: Selection of iconic British railway station and underground ambiences, tube and overground train onboards.
longDescription:
The Train Tracks Bundle is an extensive collection of train onboard sound effects, and railway station ambiences, combining ‘Onboards’, and ‘British Train Station Ambiences’ Sound Libraries, for a comprehensive and thorough compilation of railway sound effects.


Expand the horizons of your game with original and authentic train station ambiences that will add depth and realism to your projects. From the grandeur of London King's Cross and the vibrant Manchester Piccadilly to the suburban charm of London's Underground and Overground Stations. Explore the distinct acoustics of different train lines. From the resonant hum of engines, intercom announcements and the buzz of passengers, these recordings encapsulate the true essence of British railway travel.


Enhance the authenticity of your world, capture the spirit of arrivals and departures, and create an immersive sonic environment that transports your audience to the heart of railway culture.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  39 Audio Cues
  •  39 Audio Waves
  •  44.1kHz, 16 bit WAV
  • Seamless Looping
  • Over 2 hours of Audio
  • Mac & Windows Supported
